articles.title: 3 takeaways from No. 11 BYU’s loss to No. 15 Texas Tech - Deseret News
articles.content:
BYUs win streak comes to a frustrating end.
After a 13-game unbeaten run, the Cougars stumbled down the stretch to fall 84-71 Saturday at Texas Tech.
BYU is now 16-2 on the season and 4-1 in Big 12… [+1972 chars]
